sentiment_score_definition: x <= -0.35: Bearish; -0.35 < x <= -0.15: Somewhat-Bearish; -0.15 < x < 0.15: Neutral; 0.15 <= x < 0.35: Somewhat_Bullish; x >= 0.35: Bullish
relevance_score_definition: 0 < x <= 1, with a higher score indicating higher relevance.

feed.title: INVESTOR ALERT: Pomerantz Law Firm Reminds Investors with Losses on their Investment in Bakkt Holdings, Inc. of Class Action Lawsuit and Upcoming Deadlines – BKKT
feed.summary: Pomerantz LLP has filed a class action lawsuit against Bakkt Holdings, Inc. reminder investors of their right to seek appointment as Lead Plaintiff. The lawsuit follows Bakkt's disclosure that Webull Pay LLC and Bank of America were terminating their commercial agreements, which is expected to result in a 73% loss in top-line revenue for Bakkt. This news caused Bakkt's stock price to fall significantly.

feed.title: Bakkt Holdings Adopts X for Regulation FD Disclosures
feed.summary: Bakkt Holdings, Inc. announced its intention to use its official X account, @bakkt, for disclosing material non-public information and complying with Regulation FD. This strategic move encourages investors and stakeholders to monitor the account alongside traditional channels. Despite financial challenges, positive strategic moves and earnings call sentiment offer some upside potential for BKKT stock, which currently holds a "Hold" analyst rating with a $12.50 price target.

feed.title: Bakkt Holdings Adopts X for Regulation FD Disclosures
feed.summary: Bakkt Holdings, Inc. (BKKT) has announced it will use its official X account, @bakkt, for disclosing material non-public information and complying with Regulation FD. This move encourages investors to monitor the account in addition to traditional communication channels. Currently, analysts have a Hold rating on BKKT stock with a $12.50 price target, while TipRanks' AI Analyst, Spark, rates BKKT as Neutral due to financial challenges despite some positive strategic moves.

feed.title: Bakkt Holdings Sells Loyalty Business to Project Labrador
feed.summary: Bakkt Holdings Inc. has sold its Loyalty Business, including Bridge2 Solutions and Aspire Loyalty Travel Solutions, to Project Labrador Holdco, LLC, reclassifying it as discontinued operations. This move allows Bakkt to focus on core digital asset services, impacting its financial statements and market strategy. Analysts currently rate BKKT stock as a "Hold" with a $12.50 price target.

feed.title: Bakkt announces reorganization to single class of common stock, shares down ~4%
feed.summary: Bakkt Holdings, a digital asset marketplace, has announced a reorganization plan to convert its Class V common stock into Class A common stock, resulting in a single class of common stock. This move is intended to simplify its capital structure, enhance corporate governance, and appeal to a broader investor base. Following the announcement, Bakkt's shares were down approximately 4% in premarket trading.

feed.title: Bakkt announces reorganization to single class of common stock, shares down ~4%
feed.summary: Bakkt (BKKT) announced a reorganization into a single class of common stock, aiming to simplify its capital structure. This change requires stockholder approval, which the company plans to seek at its next annual meeting. Following the announcement, Bakkt's shares were down approximately 4% in late morning trading.

feed.title: Bakkt Holdings Sells Loyalty Business to Project Labrador
feed.summary: Bakkt Holdings, Inc. has sold its Loyalty Business, including Bridge2 Solutions and Aspire Loyalty Travel Solutions, to Project Labrador Holdco, LLC, a strategic move aimed at streamlining operations and focusing on core digital asset services. This transaction reclassifies the Loyalty Business as discontinued operations in Bakkt's financial statements. Analysts currently rate BKKT stock as a Hold with a $12.50 price target, while TipRanks' AI Analyst, Spark, assigns a Neutral rating due to financial challenges despite positive strategic moves.

feed.title: Bakkt Holdings, Inc. Files Post-Effective Amendments to SEC Registration Statements Following Corporate Structure Change
feed.summary: Bakkt Holdings, Inc. has filed post-effective amendments to its Form S-3 registration statements with the SEC, transitioning from an umbrella partnership-C corporation structure to a single class of common stock. This move aims to streamline its corporate structure and is a step in regulatory compliance, although no additional securities are being registered, and the amendments are not yet effective. The company, founded in 2018, focuses on providing financial infrastructure solutions for institutional participation in the digital asset economy.

feed.title: Bakkt Holdings Sells Loyalty Business to Project Labrador
feed.summary: Bakkt Holdings, Inc. (BKKT) announced the sale of its Loyalty Business, including Bridge2 Solutions and Aspire Loyalty Travel Solutions, to Project Labrador Holdco, LLC on October 1, 2025. This strategic divestment led to the Loyalty Business being reclassified as discontinued operations in Bakkt's financial statements, aiming to streamline operations and focus on digital asset services. The change will impact the company's financial landscape and market strategy, with analyst ratings currently holding at $12.50.

feed.title: INVESTOR ALERT: Pomerantz Law Firm Reminds Investors with Losses on their Investment in Bakkt Holdings, Inc. of Class Action Lawsuit and Upcoming Deadlines - BKKT
feed.summary: Pomerantz LLP has announced a class action lawsuit against Bakkt Holdings, Inc. for alleged securities fraud, advising investors who suffered losses to contact them by June 2, 2025, to potentially become Lead Plaintiff. This follows Bakkt's disclosure that Webull Pay LLC and Bank of America terminated significant commercial agreements, leading to a projected 73% loss in top-line revenue and a subsequent 27.28% drop in Bakkt's stock price. The firm is known for pioneering securities class actions and fighting for victims of corporate misconduct.

feed.title: Precision Trading with Bakkt Holdings Inc. Class A (BKKT) Risk Zones
feed.summary: This article from Stock Traders Daily outlines precision trading strategies for Bakkt Holdings Inc. Class A (BKKT) using AI models. It details institutional trading strategies, including position trading, momentum breakout, and risk hedging, tailored for different risk profiles. The piece also highlights real-time signals, multi-timeframe analysis, and personalized alerts available to users.

feed.title: Bragar Eagel & Squire, P.C. Reminds Investors That Class Action Lawsuits Have Been Filed Against Solaris, Actinium, Bakkt, and Cerevel and Encourages Investors to Contact the Firm
feed.summary: Bragar Eagel & Squire, P.C. has announced that class action lawsuits have been filed against Solaris Energy Infrastructure Inc., Actinium Pharmaceuticals Inc., Bakkt Holdings Inc., and Cerevel Therapeutics Holdings Inc. The firm is encouraging investors in these companies to contact them to potentially serve as lead plaintiffs in these cases. The lawsuits allege material misrepresentations and omissions by the companies, leading to investor damages.

feed.title: Bakkt Holdings Invests in Transchem with Warrants Deal
feed.summary: Bakkt Holdings, Inc. (BKKT) announced its decision to invest approximately $10 million in Transchem Ltd., an Indian company, through the subscription of 47.5 million warrants. This investment allows Bakkt to acquire shares in Transchem’s common stock within 18 months, with the potential for additional warrants, and is contingent on regulatory and shareholder approvals. While Bakkt faces financial challenges, the investment highlights its strategic growth initiatives in the Indian market.

feed.title: Bakkt Holdings Reports Strong Q3 Revenue Growth
feed.summary: Bakkt Holdings, Inc. Class A reported strong Q3 2025 results, with GAAP revenue increasing by 27% to $402.2 million and adjusted EBITDA surging by 241% year-over-year to $28.7 million. The company is focusing on transforming into a unified digital asset infrastructure platform and expanding customer adoption. Key strategic moves included the sale of its Loyalty business and simplification of its governance structure.

feed.title: Bakkt (NYSE: BKKT) ends Up-C structure, shifts to single-class common stock
feed.summary: Bakkt (NYSE: BKKT) announced it has completed a reorganization, eliminating its Up-C structure and transitioning to a single class of common stock. This change simplifies the company’s capital structure, aligns economic and governance rights for all shareholders, and is expected to reduce ongoing costs. Despite management's positive outlook, the stock declined 19.72% on the day this news was published, reflecting a significant negative market reaction.

feed.title: Bakkt Holdings, Inc. Completes Reorganization to Simplify Capital Structure and Enhance Shareholder Value
feed.summary: Bakkt Holdings, Inc. has completed its reorganization, simplifying its capital structure by moving to a single class of common stock and eliminating its Up-C structure. This change aims to reduce costs and align economic and governance rights for all shareholders. CEO Akshay Naheta stated this is a key milestone for Bakkt's transformation, positioning the company for execution, scale, and value creation in the digital asset economy.

feed.title: Bakkt Holdings Approves Management Stock Option Grant
feed.summary: Bakkt Holdings, Inc. shareholders approved the grant of options to management members to purchase up to 2,000,000 shares of Class A Common Stock, aiming to incentivize management and align interests with shareholders. Despite this, TipRanks' AI Analyst "Spark" rates BKKT as Neutral due to financial challenges in profitability and cash flow, although strategic initiatives offer long-term optimism. The stock currently holds a "Hold" rating from analysts with a $22.50 price target.

feed.title: BKKT Investors Have Opportunity to Lead Bakkt Holdings, Inc. Securities Fraud Lawsuit with the Schall Law Firm
feed.summary: The Schall Law Firm is reminding investors of a class action lawsuit against Bakkt Holdings, Inc. (NYSE: BKKT) for alleged securities fraud. The lawsuit claims Bakkt made false and misleading statements regarding the stability of its crypto business and the diversity of its revenue streams, particularly its reliance on a contract with Webull. Investors who purchased securities between March 25, 2024, and March 17, 2025, are encouraged to contact the firm to participate.

feed.title: Bakkt Announces Reorganization to Transition to a Single-Class Common Stock - MarketScreener
feed.summary: Bakkt Holdings, Inc. announced a reorganization to transition to a single-class common stock structure. This move aims to simplify its capital structure. The company's stock, BKKT, was trading around $42.50 USD as of the announcement.

feed.title: Bakkt Announces Plan to Simplify Capital Structure and Transition to a Single-Class Common Stock - MarketScreener
feed.summary: Bakkt Holdings, Inc. announced a plan to simplify its capital structure by transitioning to a single class of common stock. This reorganization will involve Bakkt becoming a wholly-owned subsidiary of a new holding company, also named Bakkt Holdings, Inc. The move aims to streamline the Company's capital structure and provide all shareholders with identical economic and voting rights.

feed.title: Bakkt announces reorganization to single class of common stock, shares down ~4% (BKKT:NYSE) - Seeking Alpha
feed.summary: Bakkt Holdings announced a reorganization plan to transition to a single class of common stock from its current listed public company structure. This move involves eliminating its existing umbrella partnership-C corporation structure. Following the announcement, Bakkt's shares were down approximately 3.60% in pre-market trading to $41.25.

feed.title: Bakkt Announces Plan to Simplify Capital Structure and Transition to a Single-Class Common Stock - The Globe and Mail
feed.summary: Bakkt Holdings, Inc. announced its plan to simplify its capital structure by eliminating its existing umbrella partnership-C corporation (Up-C) structure. The reorganization will result in Bakkt becoming a wholly-owned subsidiary of a new holding company, Bakkt Holdings, Inc. (NewCo), which will transition to a single class of common stock. This move is aimed at enhancing transparency, investability, and scalability, aligning Bakkt's governance with long-term shareholder interests, and improving access to institutional investors.

feed.title: Bakkt Announces Plan to Simplify Capital Structure and Transition to a Single-Class Common Stock
feed.summary: Bakkt Holdings, Inc. announced a plan to eliminate its existing umbrella partnership-C corporation (Up-C) structure and transition to a single class of common stock. This reorganization will result in a new holding company, NewCo, replacing Bakkt as the listed public company, with all shareholders holding common stock with identical economic and voting rights. The company expects to close the reorganization around November 3, 2025, aiming for enhanced transparency, investability, and scalability.

feed.title: BKKT’s Bold Moves Shake the Market
feed.summary: Bakkt Holdings Inc. (BKKT) is experiencing significant market movement, with its stock trending up by 18.8%. The company has made strategic moves including eliminating long-term debt and focusing on digital infrastructure, despite current negative profit margins and operating cash flow challenges. Analysts are watching Bakkt's potential in digital asset infrastructure and its evolution in the global financial arena.

feed.title: Understanding the 31.82% Stock Leap for This Crypto Co.
feed.summary: Bakkt Holdings Inc. (BKKT:NYSE) recently experienced a significant 31.82% stock surge, reaching US$33.68 on September 30, 2025. This impressive gain is attributed to its role as a premier cryptocurrency marketplace, integrating digital currencies into traditional financial frameworks amidst a growing interest in the crypto sector. The article explores the company's overview, market performance, and the broader industry trends driving its stock advancement, highlighting Bakkt's potential in the evolving financial technology landscape.

feed.title: BKKT Stockholders Have Opportunity to Lead Bakkt Holdings, Inc. Class Action Lawsuit – Contact Bronstein, Gewirtz and Grossman, LLC Today!
feed.summary: Bronstein, Gewirtz & Grossman, LLC has filed a class action lawsuit against Bakkt Holdings, Inc. (NYSE:BKKT) and its officers for alleged violations of federal securities laws. The lawsuit claims that Bakkt made misleading statements regarding the stability and diversity of its crypto services revenue, its dependence on a single contract with Webull, and its ability to maintain key client relationships. Investors who purchased Bakkt securities between March 25, 2024, and March 17, 2025, are encouraged to contact the law firm to learn about leading the class action.

feed.title: BKKT INVESTOR ALERT: Bronstein, Gewirtz and Grossman, LLC Announces that Bakkt Holdings, Inc. Shareholders Have Opportunity to Lead Class Action Lawsuit!
feed.summary: Bronstein, Gewirtz & Grossman, LLC has filed a class action lawsuit against Bakkt Holdings, Inc. (NYSE:BKKT) and certain officers, alleging violations of federal securities laws. The lawsuit seeks to recover damages for investors who purchased Bakkt securities between March 25, 2024, and March 17, 2025, due to alleged materially false and misleading statements regarding the Company's crypto services revenue and client relationships. Shareholders have until June 2, 2025, to request to be appointed as lead plaintiff in the case.

feed.title: Bakkt Holdings, Inc. Shareholders Who Lost Money on Their
feed.summary: Johnson Fistel, PLLP has initiated a class action lawsuit on behalf of investors in Bakkt Holdings, Inc. (NYSE: BKKT) who incurred losses from March 25, 2024, to March 17, 2025. The lawsuit alleges that Bakkt Holdings made materially false and misleading statements regarding the stability and diversity of its crypto services revenue, particularly its undisclosed reliance on a single contract with Webull. Investors are encouraged to contact Johnson Fistel to potentially serve as lead plaintiff or to determine their eligibility for recovery.

feed.title: INVESTOR ALERT: Pomerantz Law Firm Reminds Investors with Losses on their Investment in Bakkt Holdings, Inc. of Class Action Lawsuit and Upcoming Deadlines - BKKT
feed.summary: Pomerantz LLP has filed a class action lawsuit against Bakkt Holdings, Inc. (NYSE: BKKT) following significant revenue loss disclosures. Investors who suffered losses are encouraged to contact the firm by the June 2, 2025 deadline to seek appointment as Lead Plaintiff. The lawsuit stems from Bakkt's announcement of contract terminations by Webull Pay LLC and Bank of America, which are projected to cause a collective 73% loss in top-line revenue, leading to a substantial drop in Bakkt's stock price.

feed.title: Bakkt Holdings Inc. Class A (BKKT) reports earnings
feed.summary: Bakkt Holdings Inc. Class A (BKKT) reported significant revenue growth in its fiscal year 2024, driven primarily by crypto services, while also noting a net loss decrease. The company faces a major client non-renewal but is realigning its business focus towards crypto and exploring strategic alternatives for its loyalty business. Bakkt also details its liquidity position and recent corporate actions like a reverse stock split.

feed.title: Bakkt Holdings completes holding company reorganization, maintains NYSE listing
feed.summary: Bakkt Holdings, Inc. announced the completion of a holding company reorganization, creating a new parent company also named Bakkt Holdings, Inc., to streamline its corporate structure. The new entity replaced the old one on the NYSE, with shares continuing to trade under "BKKT" and existing shares converting automatically. This strategic move follows the sale of its Loyalty business, indicating a full transition to a digital asset infrastructure platform.

feed.title: Bakkt Statement on Transaction Rumors
feed.summary: Bakkt Holdings, Inc. (NYSE: BKKT) has acknowledged rumors circulating in the financial press regarding a potential transaction involving the Company. Bakkt stated that it is their policy not to comment on market rumors or speculation. The company emphasized its focus on building solutions for clients in the crypto economy through institutional-grade custody, trading, and onramp capabilities.

feed.title: DJT, Bakkt stocks pop on report Trump Media in talks to acquire crypto trading platform
feed.summary: Shares of Trump Media & Technology Group (DJT) and Bakkt (BKKT) surged after a report indicated that Trump Media is in advanced talks to acquire the crypto exchange platform Bakkt. This news comes amidst increased bitcoin prices following Donald Trump's election win, with the former president signaling a more crypto-friendly administration. Trump Media also recently released its Q3 earnings, showing a net loss and current revenue.

feed.title: Bakkt Reports Third Quarter 2024 Results
feed.summary: Bakkt Holdings, Inc. announced its financial and operational results for the third quarter ended September 30, 2024, highlighting a significant improvement in net loss and a strategic rollout of its institutional trading platform, BakktX. The company also reported increased crypto-enabled accounts, notional traded volume, and assets under custody, alongside an updated 2024 financial guidance. Bakkt is investigating the wind-down of Bakkt Trust to focus on core brokerage and institutional trading services.

feed.title: Intercontinental Exchange picks up $304k in Bakkt Holdings shares By Investing.com
feed.summary: Intercontinental Exchange (NYSE: ICE), a significant shareholder in Bakkt Holdings Inc. (NYSE:BKKT), recently acquired additional Bakkt shares valued at approximately $304,212 and exercised options on warrants totaling $8,947,440. These transactions signal ICE's continued confidence in Bakkt, despite Bakkt's negative gross profit margin and forecast sales decline, as highlighted by InvestingPro Insights.

feed.title: Bakkt announces 1-for-25 reverse stock split
feed.summary: Bakkt Holdings, Inc. announced a 1-for-25 reverse stock split for its Class A and Class V common stock, effective April 26, 2024, to meet NYSE listing standards. The company will proportionally adjust its authorized shares and issue cash for fractional shares. InvestingPro insights highlight Bakkt's $56.55 million market cap, negative P/E ratio, and significant revenue growth despite a negative gross profit margin, with analysts anticipating a sales decline and high stock volatility.

feed.title: Bakkt Announces Preliminary 2023 Financial Results; Preliminary Estimates Within Previously Provided Guidance
feed.summary: Bakkt Holdings, Inc. announced its preliminary financial results for the fourth quarter and full year ended December 31, 2023. The preliminary estimates for total revenues, gross crypto revenues, net loyalty revenues, and free cash flow usage for both periods are within previously provided guidance ranges. The company expects to report its audited fourth quarter and full-year 2023 results in March.

feed.title: Bakkt Announces Relaunch of Bakkt® Custody with Additional Functionality and Expanded Asset Support
feed.summary: Bakkt Holdings, Inc. has relaunched its Bakkt® Custody platform with enhanced capabilities, a revitalized interface, and a foundation designed for future functionality additions. The updated platform includes segregated on-chain wallet addresses, configurable security processes, and advanced reporting features, operating under Bakkt Trust Company LLC, an NYDFS Qualified Custodian. Additionally, Bakkt will expand its asset support to include six new tokens, bringing the total to eight, aligning with those offered through Bakkt® Trading.

feed.title: Bakkt Announces Expansion of International Footprint and Custody Client Base
feed.summary: Bakkt Holdings, Inc. announced a significant international expansion of its crypto capabilities, partnering with clients like Hapi to enter new markets in Latin America, Europe, and Asia by year-end. Domestically, Bakkt is set to join EDX Markets' clearing house and custodial network as a backup qualified custodian. The company is actively focusing on business durability, aiming for a revenue mix with an increasing share from subscription-based annual recurring revenue, and will release its third-quarter 2023 earnings on November 14, 2023.

feed.title: Planet Hollywood Resort & Casino's Iconic Live Entertainment Venue Officially Becomes Bakkt Theater on March 24
feed.summary: Planet Hollywood Resort & Casino's live entertainment venue, formerly Zappos Theater, will officially debut as Bakkt Theater on March 24th, following multimillion-dollar enhancements. The renaming coincides with a robust deal between Caesars Entertainment and Bakkt Holdings, Inc., which will allow Caesars Rewards members to redeem Rewards Credits through Bakkt Crypto Rewards, pending regulatory approval. Bakkt Theater will continue to host world-class entertainment, starting with Miranda Lambert's residency.

feed.title: Planet Hollywood’s Zappos Theater becomes the new Bakkt Theater
feed.summary: The Zappos Theater at Planet Hollywood is being rebranded as the Bakkt Theater starting March 24, 2023, following a new partnership between Caesars Entertainment and digital asset company Bakkt Holdings Inc. The venue, which has hosted numerous high-profile residencies, has also undergone multimillion-dollar enhancements. Miranda Lambert will be the first artist to perform in the newly named Bakkt Theater.

feed.title: Bakkt Theater to replace Zappos Theater name at Planet Hollywood
feed.summary: The showroom at Planet Hollywood, formerly known as Zappos Theater, will be renamed Bakkt Theater. This change comes as Bakkt Holdings, Inc., a technology platform for crypto and loyalty, solidifies its relationship with Caesars Entertainment. The partnership aims to integrate Bakkt Crypto Rewards into the Caesars Rewards program, offering new crypto options to customers.

feed.title: Bakkt and VPC Impact Acquisition Holdings Merger Completes
feed.summary: Bakkt Holdings, LLC and VPC Impact Acquisition Holdings (NASDAQ: VIH) have completed their merger. Bakkt will begin trading as a public company on the New York Stock Exchange on October 18, under the ticker "BKKT". Intercontinental Exchange (ICE) will maintain an approximately 68% economic interest in the combined company.
